description: Make this zesty Asian salad featuring flavoursome meatballs for an easy, fresh and filling lunch or dinner.
name: Asian Meatball Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place salad leaves, tomato, onion, carrot, cucumber, mint and remaining coriander in a large bowl. Add dressing and toss to combine. Top salad with meatballs and peanuts. Serve.
